structure.unit: Chapter 19 RESPONSIBLE PROPERTY OWNER AND MERCHANT ACT

law.catch_line: Parking Lot Repairs Require a Permit.

text.section:
Sec. 19-15.4. Parking Lot Repairs Require a Permit.
Repairs to parking and paved areas shall require prior permit approval of the Building, Planning and Zoning and Public Works Departments. Repairs shall be defined as: application of seal coating, resurfacing parking or alteration of paved areas, including the application of new striping. All work shall be performed by a licensed contractor.
